function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Participants may have limited knowledge of the current covid-19 mitigation measures, leading to non-compliance and misinformation.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants may perceive the covid-19 measures as unclear, leading to confusion and potential non-compliance.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Measurement of negative emotions related to covid-19 on a 7-point likert scale could lead to underreporting or misinterpretation of emotional impact.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived certainty of punishment for violating covid-19 measures may influence compliance behavior and risk perception.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Measurement of capacity to comply with covid-19 measures involves subjective assessments that may not accurately reflect actual behavior and adherence.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low support for covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor compliance due to perceived negative impact","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low morale due to negative emotions","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants with underlying health issues at risk for contracting covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low compliance with covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived threat of coronavirus","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Participants providing professional care for covid-19 patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Visiting friends or family over the age of 75 on a regular basis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Survey participation excluding individuals who failed the attention check","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for non-compliance with pandemic measures due to perceptions of procedural fairness and justice","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of political orientation on compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of limited choice leading to compliance out of coercion and fear","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to non-compliant behavior","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of descriptive social norm on compliance","category":"Social and behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obligation to obey the law and procedural justice influencing compliance","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to high costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to strain and negative emotions","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to deterrent effect of measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to lack of capacity to comply","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to comply with social distancing and staying at home measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of substantive moral support for the measures","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with mitigation measures such as staying home and social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disregard for the risk to vulnerable populations when not following guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ignoring the possibility of a new spike in cases by easing up with measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Trust in science predicts compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of covid-19 associated with increased compliance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic endowments influence compliance with stay-at-home measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in compliance globally","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Influence of personality characteristics on willingness to accept restrictions","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association of political orientation with compliance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the sars-cov-2 virus globally","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of treatment or vaccine for sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of communication in generating desirable behavior","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on the health status of employees","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and disease prevention","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access requirements explicitly mentioned for policy measures","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of non-unique policy measures in different media reports","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Existential threat to companies in case of prolonged sales decline","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retrieving 536 media reports from the database nexis could expose individuals to potentially contagious diseases if the database was accessed in a high-risk environment.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyzing 152 articles for policy measures could pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases if the analysis is conducted in a high-risk environment.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing interrater reliability and refining criteria among researchers could increase the risk of disease transmission in case of close collaboration in a high-risk environment.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary interview conditions may promote the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity during interviews may increase the risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended data collection process may expose interviewees and interviewers to multiple sources of contagion","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
